Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, containing many small white and metallic inclusions, the exterior is covered with light-brown slip and faint traces of six lines of black-painted Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393806) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393806)
